DOC.brief_title: Radiomic Assessment NSCLC : Correlation Between Multiparametric Imaging Biomarkers Genetic Biomarkers
DOC.detailed_description: To evaluate relationship multiparametric image biomarkers ( CT , PET/CT , MRI ) genetic analysis NSCLC patient
DOC.criteria: Suspected lung cancer chest CT histologically proven NSCLC Participant consider conventional/neoadjuvant/targeted chemotherapy surgery At least one measurable primary intrathoracic lesion > = 2cm , accord RECIST Performance status 0 2 ECOG scale Age 20 year older Able tolerable PET/CT CT imaging require protocol Able undergo percutaneous needle biopsy chemotherapy Able give studyspecific inform consent Poorly control diabetes Contraindication CT contrast agent
